ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Belt of Concordance speedup
ygData.msgSnippet: The belt is indeed the same speed as the FBSS. With FBSS you ll get the same results with all your tests as you did with the BoC. The belt has no special
ygData.messageBody:
The belt is indeed the same speed as the FBSS. With FBSS you'll get the same results with all your tests
as you did with the BoC. The belt has no "special" ability which puts you at 75%. There is a CAP on weapon
speed. It is roughly 55% of the original weapon speed. Meaning if you stack just about *any* attack speed
buff on a FBSS, BoC, Swirlspine, CoF, RBB, etc it will always cap out at that 55% of the original weapon
speed.
Not sure if you noticed, or if its even practiced on your server, but enchanters no long use swift like
the wind for this reason. Its just a bigger waste of mana, so they use Augment instead. Its a lower level
spell, costs less mana, adds less speed than SLTW, adds AGI and AC.
I'm not sure how you came to the calculation of 75% speedup. You have listed that all the delays are
capped at 20 with Item + Bard songs. (Also note monks were complaining of having this delay cap on them,
thus innate monk haste went in soon after).
20 (maximum HTH delay)/36 (original delay) = 0.55, 55%.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr

kim@... wrote:

> I got this belt this weekend in PoA. I tested it (tried to
> resist when my guildmates joked about me posting test figures
> for it the next day, but I finally caved :). The initial
> timings were really strange (giving me better-than-Swift
> speed), so I timed it again this morning. I think I know
> what's going on now.
>
> Time Swings Delay %chg Delay %chg Speed
> Normal 177.7 50 35.54 - -
>
> Bard
> Warsong(50) 285.8 100 28.58 -19.58% 24.35%
> Anthem 162.5 50 32.50 -8.55% 9.35%
> Celerity 147.8 50 29.56 -16.83% 20.23%
> Beserk(50) 148.1 49 30.22 -14.96% 17.59%
> Verses 136.9 50 27.38 -22.96% 29.80%
>
> Enchanter
> Quick(18) 51.9 19 27.32 -23.14% 30.11%
> 27.3 10 27.30 -23.19% 30.18%
> Swift(50) 22.0 10 22.00 -38.10% 61.55%
>
> Item
> BoC 61.3 20 30.65 -13.76% 15.95%
>
> Item + Bard
> BoC+VoV 40.8 20 20.40 -42.60% 74.22%
> 40.7 20 20.35 -42.74% 74.64%
> BoC+Anthem 40.7 20 20.35 -42.74% 74.64%
> 40.5 20 20.25 -43.02% 75.51%
> BoC+Celerity 40.7 20 20.35 -42.74% 74.64%
> BoC+Warsong 40.6 20 20.30 -42.88% 75.07%
>
> The belt by itself is only a 15% speedup. Some people were
> complaining that this plane of Air item only had the same 15%
> speedup as the other haste items available from "mundane"
> creatures (Frenzied, Swirlspine guardian). I think to make
> the belt special, Verant made it so combining it with any
> other haste put you at 75% speedup (which may be max).
> Combined with *any* bard speedup, it puts me at 75% speedup.
> My hunch is it'll do the same combined with any enchanter
> speedup, including augmentation. I don't believe the FBSS and
> Swirlspine belt work like this, as the timings I've seen for
> those just added 15%ish speedup to the song. (Wanna lend me
> yours so I can test it, Rokenn? :)
>
> My six-note and Waki swing really really fast with 75% haste.
> :) It's a real killer on my stamina though.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
